alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern York and northeastern Fillmore Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lushton, or 11 miles southwest of York, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McCool Junction around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Waco. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 347 and 364. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
